name: Eusapia (adasamiee)
description:
Created By: Ada Samiee

Game Design Document:  https://docs.google.com/document/d/1GQvf41RS-6vKcgYz0jDs50FvppBxn1yk09AtwRpLu2o/...

Description

Eusapia is based on the story of two cities, one for the “living,” and the other for the “dead.” In this level, you explore Lower Eusapia. The player can collect items, speak to the citizens, and be interrogated by the Hooded Brothers. When exploring, play close attention to the culture of the city, to be able to pass off as a real citizen of Lower Eusapia, and deceive the Hooded Brothers.

  • Cartoon Anime Stylized HDRI skybox pack by Mkzart on Unity Asset Store: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/cartoon-anime-stylized-hdri-skybox-pack...
